synopsis.text: Dark River is the most mysterious assassin organization in the jianghu world. It consists of three powerful families - Su, Xie, and Mu. The heads of these three families are collectively called the Patriarchs and they rule over Dark River. However, the Patriarchs have been poisoned and their lives are now hanging by a thread. Sensing vulnerability, the three families secretly plot to overthrow the Patriarchs and take control of Dark River. Su Muyu leads the Patriarchs' elite guard squad "Spider Shadow". He desperately tries to find an antidote and defend the Patriarchs from the rebelling assassins. Muyu recruits Bai Hehuai, a genius doctor from Medicine King Valley, to heal the Patriarchs. Ironically, Muyu's best friend Su Changhe is working against him. Changhe joins forces with the Su family to try and assassinate the Patriarchs. Muyu now has to fight off Changhe and the full might of the power-hungry families to protect Dark River's leadership.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
